文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk1
证据片段: Tubing specimens are cut to 15 cm in length

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk1
证据片段: loaded with 10 ± 1 mg of iodine crystals (>99.7% purity)

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk1
证据片段: The specimen is sealed in a high-purity argon pressurization system

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk2
证据片段: The environment is flowing Ar + 40 Pa I₂ gas, temperature is 310°C, and test times vary between 12 and 48 h.

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: Three lots of reactor-grade Zircaloy-2 tubing in the stress-relieved condition are selected for study.

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: Dimensions for Lots 1 and 2 are 10.9, 12.8, and $0 . 9 5 \mathrm { \ m m }$ for inside diameter, outside diameter, and wall thickness, respectively.

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: The grains are thin and elongated from the coldworked and stress-relieved thermomechanical treatment with a grain size of ASTM No. 11 in the longitudinal direction and ASTM No. 11.5 in the tangential direction.

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: The grains are thin and elongated from the coldworked and stress-relieved thermomechanical treatment with a grain size of ASTM No. 11 in the longitudinal direction and ASTM No. 11.5 in the tangential direction.

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: For tests at $3 2 0 \%$ , Lots 1 and 2 receive an additional stress-relief treatment at $5 0 0 ^ { \circ } \mathrm { C } / 2 \mathrm { ~ h ~ }$ to eliminate residual stress from tube straightening

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: and are then pickled in $4 5 \mathrm { H } _ { 2 } O - 4 5 \mathrm { H N O } _ { 3 ^ { - } } 1 0 \mathrm { H F }$ to remove the thin oxide layer and to produce the same final surface appearance

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: For the $3 9 0 \%$ tests, Lots 1 and 2 are tested in the as-received condition.

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: Foil thickness is typically 50 to $8 0 ~ \mu \mathrm { m }$

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk3
证据片段: Zircaloy-2 and -4 plates are used for DCB specimen fabrication.

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk4
证据片段: Specimen 1-43; Stress 315 MPa; Time to Failure 80.8 min; Strain at Failure 1.64%

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk5
证据片段: Threshold stress values decrease as the irradiation effect on mechanical properties approaches saturation

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk5
证据片段: Extensive incipient cracking is observed in tube pressurization tests at 325 and 360°C

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk5
证据片段: Extensive incipient cracking is observed in tube pressurization tests at 325 and 360°C

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk6
证据片段: a higher fraction of basal poles oriented in the crack opening direction should correspond to easier crack propagation. Such a texture has both a lower $K _ { \mathrm { I s c c } }$

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk6
证据片段: The cold-rolling of the plate imparts a "pancake" shape to the grains which gives a different microstructure ahead of the NL and NT cracks compared with the TL cracks

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk6
证据片段: Metallography of tube cross sections and SEM observations of the tube inside diameter show sharp cracks as small as one or two grains

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk6
证据片段: Videm and Lunde [26] found that a 50-μm crack decreases the threshold stress compared with unflawed specimens

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk6
证据片段: essentially all the lifetime at $3 2 0 \textdegree$ is consumed by crack propagation at the threshold stress

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk6
证据片段: lifetime is intiation-controlled for the smoothbar threshold

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk6
证据片段: differences in chemistry between the fracture mechanics experiments (flowing system with iodine replenishment) and the tube pressurization tests (static system with fixed quantity of iodine)

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_044_chunk8
证据片段: Cooling to the test temperatures results in an increase in crack growth rate, da/dr, with increase in temperature, given by the following Arrhenius relationship da/dt = 6.86 × 10^-1 exp(-71500/RT)
